biotools.summary:
A phylogenetic mixture model to reconstruct gene-content evolutionary history using a realistic evolutionary rate model.

Mirage is ancestral genome estimation software with high accuracy based on a phylogenetic mixture model and a RER model.

bioschemas.name: Mirage-evol
